notes: [Fixed] Limit the data returned on a successful save for an AJAX request. This removes potentially sensitive data from being returned.
[Fixed] Fixed a PHP error that would occur if the guest entry failed validation.
[Added] Added `guestEntries.success` and `guestEntries.error` events that get fired when the entry is successfully saved or not.
[Improved] Updated to take advantage of new Craft 2.5 plugin features.
